sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { LanguageContext } from '../App'; import { translations } from '../utils/translations'; // Contact page - Representative/Showcase version function Contact() { const { language } = useContext(LanguageContext); const t = translations.contact; return (
{/* Page Header */}

{t.title[language]}

{t.subtitle[language]}

{/* Contact Information Only */}
{/* Instructions */}

{language === 'en' ? 'How to Reach Us' : '‡§π‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡§∏‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡•á'}

{language === 'en' ? 'For any inquiries, admissions, or general information, please contact us using the details below. Our staff is available during office hours to assist you.' : '‡§ï‡•Å‡§®‡•à ‡§™‡§®‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ß‡§™‡•Å‡§õ, ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§æ, ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡§ø, ‡§ï‡•É‡§™‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§≤‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ó‡§∞‡•á‡§∞ ‡§π‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡•Å‡§π‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡•§ ‡§π‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§π‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§§‡§™‡§æ‡§à‡§Ç‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡§π‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§® ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß ‡§õ‡§®‡•ç‡•§'}

{t.infoTitle[language]}

üìç

); } export default Contact;
